body_text: Noticed the website isn't pointing to the latest normalize.css version, just simply changes the hardtext & links.

Small fix to correct this repository's language breakdown graph.
Since Normalize.css is purposefully excluded from language stats on GitHub, a .gitattributes file is needed to include it in the languages breakdown. Currently, the codebase is marked as 100% HTML.
More info on the linguist-vendored attribute here.
I added a jsDelivr CDN link to your readme as an alternative to cdnjs. jsDelivr is the fastest opensource CDN available and built specifically for production usage.
Fixes #727 by rendering the main element as block-element for IE.

Solved #813
Hey Managers,
I hope you all are safe and doing great things.
Just added a Usage option in the readme.md for the import statement.
